and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = bp.`uid` and bu1.uname like concat('%',#{queryName},'%'))
and exists (select 1 from b_user bu1 where bu1.`uid` = bp.`uid` and bu1.mobile like concat('%',#{queryMobile},'%'))
and bp.`address` like concat('%',#{queryAddress},'%')
and bp.`content` like concat('%',#{queryContent},'%')
and CONCAT(',',bp.`content_type`,',') like CONCAT('%,',#{suoshuleixing},',%')
and bp.`uid` = #{queryUserId}
and bp.`committee_id` = #{committeeId}
and bp.`operate_id` = #{operateId}
and bp.`status` != 2
ORDER BY bp.create_time DESC
